more.Name: Medical/Mental Health Transfer Summary
more.Summary: The Medical/Mental Health Transfer Summary IEPD was developed for the California Department of Justice - Data Exchange Project.
more.Description: A Medical/Mental Health Transfer Summary details medical data about a subject.  The data is sent from the jail to the California Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation reception center if a subject is transferred from local custody to the jurisdiction of the California Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation.  The Medical/Mental Health Transfer Summary contains information pertaining to the subject, medications, and other medical history information.  The Medical/Mental Health Transfer Summary is one of 44 IEPDs developed by the California Department of Justice - Data Exchange Project to support information exchange between state and local government organizations throughout the state of California.  It could also be adapted for use in other states.
more.Status: IEPD MMHTransSum complete and ready for implementation
more.ExchangePartners: California state and local criminal justice agencies
more.Process: When the jail transfers custody of a subject to the jurisdiction of the California Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation, the Medical/Mental Health Transfer Summary is sent to the reception center.
more.Conditions: If a subject is transferred from local custody to the jurisdiction of the California Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation
more.Sponsors: California Department of Justice and other California state and local criminal justice agencies - see master documentation
more.Purpose: To inform the California Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation of a transfer subject's medical/mental health summary.
more.ExchangePartnerCategories: California state and local criminal justice agencies
